Package de.systemagmbh.interfaces.config

Interface Summary
ISysConfig An ISysConfig object holds a configuration tree and all informations necessary to load and save the configuration back to the place where it came from.
ISysConfigItem The configuration tree item.
ISysConfigManager This is the base for all configuration managers.
 

Class Summary
FSysConfig This factory loads the configuration manager.
 

Exception Summary
CSysConfigCastException This exception wraps NumberFormatExceptions in getXXXValue() methods.
CSysConfigException This is the base exception class for all config managers.
CSysConfigFormatException This exception is thrown when an operation on a tree node fails (e. g. add a parameter as a child to a parameter)
CSysConfigIOException This exception is thrown when the get/set of data fails.
CSysConfigNotFoundException This exception is thrown when the configuration (e.g. file, database) is not found.
CSysItemNotFoundException This exception is thrown when an element could not be found in the configuration.
